# transactions

**Instance Property**

Returns an array of pending transactions.

## Declaration

```swift
var transactions: [SKPaymentTransaction] { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is undefined when there are no observers attached to the payment queue.

## Related Documentation

- **add(_:)**: Adds an observer to the payment queue.

## Managing Transactions

- **delegate**: A delegate that provides information needed to complete transactions.
- **add(_:)**: Adds a payment request to the queue.
- **finishTransaction(_:)**: Notifies the App Store that the app finished processing the transaction.
